description:
Quill Rich Text Editor plugin for bubble.io is a plugin that allows your application's users to create and edit rich text content directly on the application. 

Quill is a WYSIWYG editor built for the modern web. 

It has a modular architecture and expressive API that enables users to customize it for any need.

The plugin has a modern look and dynamic toolbar options that make the input highly customizable. 

Users can select a preset or, toolbar or tooltip menu, and media features such as image upload and resize.

The plugin also supports actions and events such as setting focus, resetting input, and triggering workflows when the text value changes. 

Quill Rich Text Editor plugin for bubble.io is a powerful and flexible tool for creating rich text content on your no code applications.
name: Quill Rich Text Editor
